question:
Did    they - the moment - not - remember - left - she
24. Arrange the words into a good sentence
A. 2 - 1 - 4 - 6 - 7 -5 -3
B. 7 - 4 - 5 -2 -1 - 3-6
C. 1 - 7 - 5-3-2-4-6
D. 2 - 1 - 4 - 5 - 3 - 7 - 6 ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. 2 1 4 5 3 7

They did not remember the moment she left

related_questions.question:

b.

c.

d.

​

a.
